Text:
Thanks for uploading the original Total Recall, it's a real classic! Here's a good review of the movie and the Mind Bending Edition bluRay: http://bluray.highdefdigest.com/7010/total_recall_mbe.html
As you can see it's not perfect yet but it's better than the previous bluray versions.
btw I tried to watch the 2012 remake a few days ago, I fell asleep during the movie!
True the one in the 90 `s is way better then 2012 ! Its a classic one ! the 2012 sux ! ty for the hq 3li
